Event.name: Fighting_activity
Event.definition:
<def-root>A generally large group of people, the <fen>Combatants</fen>, are engaged in a chaotic, violent, and usually protracted <fen>Fight</fen> amongst themselves. There are no distinct sides, and generally no particular goal (compare Hostile_encounter). The <fen>Fight</fen> may be described as having a <fen>Manner</fen> or <fen>Degree</fen> of violence. <fen>Time</fen> and <fen>Place</fen> may also be expressed.
<ex><fex name="Combatants">The gladiators</fex> entered the <fex name="Fight"><t>fray</t></fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Combatants
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Combatants</fen> participate as fighters in the <fen>Fight</fen>. <ex>The football referee's controversial call led to a bloody <t>free-for-all</t> <fex name="Combatants">among the fans</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Fight
Arg.definition: <def-root>The violent activity. <ex>I couldn't help but watch as several bruised people reentered the <fex name="Fight"><t>melee</t></fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The manner of the <fen>Fight</fen>. <ex>Officers said they were stunned upon arrival at the scene of the <fex name="Mnr">raucous</fex> <t>fray</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the <fen>Degree</fen> of violence of the <fen>Fight</fen>. <ex>The townspeople engaged in a <fex name="Deg">full-scale</fex> <t>free-for-all</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Salient_activity
Arg.definition: <def-root>An activity that engaged in by the <fen>Combatants</fen> while fighting. <ex><fex name="SA">stabbing</fex> <t>affray</t></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which the <fen>Fight</fen> takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The means by which the <fen>Combatants</fen> engage in the <fen>Fight</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The weapon or other instrument used by the <fen>Combatants</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of affairs that (some of) he <fen>Combatants</fen> wish to acheive by fighting.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: melee.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a confused crowd or scuffle.

lexUnit.name: free-for-all.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a disorganized or unrestricted situation or event in which everyone may take part, especially a fight or discussion.

lexUnit.name: affray.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a breach of the peace by fighting in a public place.

lexUnit.name: fracas.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a noisy disturbance or quarrel.
